title: "Animal Tea Party"
content:
Welcome to our website, where you can immerse yourself in the whimsical world of the Animal Tea Party. Our site is a gathering place for animal lovers and tea enthusiasts alike, featuring charming anthropomorphic creatures enjoying a delightful tea party in a magical setting. 

Join us as we explore the wonderland of tea parties with rabbits, cats, hedgehogs, and other furry friends. Discover new tea blends, learn about the art of tea-making, and find inspiration for your next tea party with our collection of recipes and decor ideas.

Whether you're here to enjoy the beautiful wallpaper or to dive deeper into the world of tea parties, we hope you'll find something to delight you on our site. So pour yourself a cup of tea, sit back, and let the magic of the Animal Tea Party transport you to a world of whimsy and wonder. üê∞ü´ñ‚ú®

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A whimsical tea party with anthropomorphic animals"

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
